item.title: Mr. Walker
item.description: I recently came across this video of a penguin, call him Walker, committing suicide by running away from it all; the colony, the ocean, sustenance and everything that is essential for survival. On the surface, it doesn’t make any sense, penguins are among the social creatures on earth. If nothing else, he should have wanted to stay in the colony. We can’t know for sure what was happening in his mind but we can make educated guesses.
